lines: 1. Ruoth Yesu, agombo bedo ng`ati chuth;In mond` idag e chunya pile pile;Gol kuoma maricho gi tim ma ok ler;Luoka gi rembi mond` abedi mapoth.
Luoka mapoth, iluoka mapoth;Pwodha gi rembi, mond` abedi mapoth.
2. Ruoth Yesu, para gi e polo malo;Ikonya ni mond` achiwrani chutho,Misango mangima, maler, malong`o;Luoka gi rembi mond` abedi mapoth.
3. Ruoth Yesu, akwayoi gi chuny mamuol,Arito koro ni mondo igwedha;Rembi mond` oguda kuom duto mak ler;Luoka gi rembi mond` abedi mapoth.
4. Ruoth Yesu, aling` nyimi ka ageno,Ni mondo ichwena chuny manyien chutho;To jogo makwayi ok iniriembgi;Luoka gi rembi mond` abed mapoth.
